      • drawText

        public static void drawText(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch,
                            java.lang.String text,
                            float x,
                            float y,
                            com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color,
                            float scale)
        Draws text when called, but requires continuous calls to keep the text there
        Parameters:
        batch - spritebatch used to draw
        text - characters to render
        x - x position
        y - y position
        color - color of text to be drawn
        scale - size of text to be drawn

      • drawTimeoutText

        public static void drawTimeoutText(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch,
                                   java.lang.String text,
                                   float x,
                                   float y,
                                   com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color,
                                   float scale,
                                   float secTimeout)
        Draws text for a specific amount of time
        Parameters:
        batch - spritebatch used to draw
        text - characters to render
        x - x position
        y - y position
        color - color of text to be drawn
        scale - size of text to be drawn
        secTimeout - time in seconds for how long the text should be drawn for

      • getScaledDrawer

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont getScaledDrawer(float scale)
        For use with a GlyphLayout, so that the GlyphLayout processes the text with the correct scale
        Parameters:
        scale - size of text for use with layout
        Returns:
        returns the bitmapfont object

      • update

        public static void update(CameraController camera)
        Necessary update method to place in the main render loop that draws all pending text in the stack
        Parameters:
        camera - camera to draw on
